task.title: Editing a certificate profile by using the command line
task.shortdesc: System administrators can edit a certificate profile by using the update CertificateProfile command.

context.p: You can edit a certificate profile by using the command line, or by using the . For more information about using the to edit a certificate profile, see .
For more information about the components that you must specify when you edit certificate profiles, see .

step.cmd: To edit a certificate profile, enter the following command:
step.info:
The command must be capitalized as shown, and must use the double quotation marks as shown.
update CertificateProfile "Name=profileName" "Certificate=certificateName" "Key=keyName"Where:
profileName Specifies the name of the certificate profile you want to edit.
certificateName Optional. Specifies the name of the server certificate.
keyName Optional. Specifies the name of a private key.
